remove_errors.description: Whether to enable SugarC's remove_errors functionality (default False).

no_std_libs.description: Whether to enable SugarC's no_std_libs (default False).

file_pattern.description: A regular expression to apply to the filename. If the regular expression is found within the filename, then we use the specified included directories and files. Note that patterns are applied in the order specified here.

build_script.description: The location of the build script.

source_location.description: Where the source code will be after running the build_script.
